caption.p: The bud break stages used for scoring the spring phenology were (a–e), a (0)—a closed brown bud, b (1)—closed bud with protruding green leaf tips, c (2)—green leaf tips out of the bud with leaf bases hidden, d (3)—broken bud with at least one petiole and e (4)—unfolded leaf with visible leaf blade and stalk. The bud set stages used for autumn phenology scoring were f–h, f (1)—apices between full, active growth to apices with an open bud, g (0.5)—a closed green bud, and h (0)—a closed brown bud
